title: Front-page materials showcase for Gal Fashion World bags

requirements.summary: Extend the existing front-page BagGallery section with a dedicated, responsive materials/craftsmanship showcase listing the six requested materials.
acceptanceCriteria: The front page includes a visible section dedicated to bag materials/craftsmanship.
All six materials are explicitly listed as user-facing text in English: "Cotton Canvas", "Cotton Towel", "Jacquard", "Paper Raffia", "Jute", and "Beads / Embroidery".
The section is reachable in the existing single-page scroll flow (rendered within the main page, not behind a new route).
Layout is responsive (1 column on mobile, multiple columns on larger screens) and visually consistent with the existing site theme.

file_operations.description: Add a new “Materials & Craftsmanship” sub-section below the existing gallery grid inside the same SectionLayout (so it remains in the current single-page scroll flow). Render a responsive grid (1 col mobile; 2+ cols on larger screens) with six tiles and visible captions exactly: Cotton Canvas, Cotton Towel, Jacquard, Paper Raffia, Jute, Beads / Embroidery. Keep styling consistent with current gallery tiles (rounded corners, subtle shadows/hover transitions).

requirements.summary: Add six static generated images (one per material) and display them in the materials showcase with correct captions and alt text.
acceptanceCriteria: There are 6 material cards/tiles, each showing an image plus the material name caption.
All 6 images load successfully in the browser from /assets/generated/... paths (no backend routing).
Each image has appropriate English alt text describing the visual (material + bag type), and the caption text matches the material list.

file_operations.description: Add the generated static asset for the Cotton Canvas material card (studio product photo style). Ensure it is stored under frontend/public/assets/generated and will be referenced directly from the frontend via a public /assets/generated/ path.

Add the generated static asset for the Cotton Towel material card (studio product photo style). Ensure it is stored under frontend/public/assets/generated and will be referenced directly from the frontend via a public /assets/generated/ path.

Add the generated static asset for the Jacquard material card (studio product photo style). Ensure it is stored under frontend/public/assets/generated and will be referenced directly from the frontend via a public /assets/generated/ path.

Add the generated static asset for the Paper Raffia material card (woven texture, studio product photo style). Ensure it is stored under frontend/public/assets/generated and will be referenced directly from the frontend via a public /assets/generated/ path.

Add the generated static asset for the Jute material card (natural fiber texture, studio product photo style). Ensure it is stored under frontend/public/assets/generated and will be referenced directly from the frontend via a public /assets/generated/ path.

Add the generated static asset for the Beads / Embroidery material card (beadwork and embroidery details, studio product photo style). Ensure it is stored under frontend/public/assets/generated and will be referenced directly from the frontend via a public /assets/generated/ path.

Wire the six generated images into the new materials tiles using direct public paths and add accurate English alt text per image (material + bag type). Use the exact filenames: frontend/public/assets/generated/material-cotton-canvas-bag.dim_1200x1200.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/material-cotton-towel-bag.dim_1200x1200.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/material-jacquard-bag.dim_1200x1200.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/material-paper-raffia-bag.dim_1200x1200.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/material-jute-bag.dim_1200x1200.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/material-beads-embroidery-bag.dim_1200x1200.png.
